123-triazole-1.description: Copper-catalyzed Huisgen cycloaddition of an alkyne and an azide to form a 123-triazole (implicit azide formation from primary and secondary halides).

123-triazole-2.description: Copper-catalyzed Huisgen cycloaddition of an alkyne and an azide to form a 123-triazole.

123-triazole-3.description: Ruthenium-catalyzed Huisgen cycloaddition of an alkyne and an azide to form a 123-triazole (implicit azide formation from primary and secondary halides).

123-triazole-4.description: Ruthenium-catalyzed Huisgen cycloaddition of an alkyne and an azide to form a 123-triazole.

124-triazole-1.description: 124-triazole from an aryl nitrile and an amidine.
124-triazole-1.long_name: 3,5-Disubstituted 1,2,4-Triazole formation from aryl nitriles and amidines

124-triazole-3.description: 124-triazole from a nitrile and a carboxylate using hydrazine.

5-het-amination.description: Amination of 5-member heterocycles (n-alkyl-imidazole, thiazole, oxazole, isoxazole, benzothiazole, benzimidazole, and benzoxazole).
5-het-amination.long_name: Amination of 5-member heterocycles (n-alkyl-imidazole, thiazole, oxazole, isoxazole, benzothiazole, benzimidazole, and benzoxazole)

5-het-arylation.description: Arylation of 5-member heterocycles, including: thiophene, n-methyl-imidazole, 4-methyl-thiazole, 2-methyl-furan, benzothiophene, and benzothiazole.

BOC-protection.description: Protection of a primary or secondary amine with a Boc-group
BOC-protection.long_name: Protection of a primary or secondary amine with a Boc-group

N-azole-arylation.description: N-arylation of azoles, including: indole, pyrazole, imidazole, triazole, tetrazole, benzimidazole, and indazoles.
N-azole-arylation.long_name: N-Arylation of azoles from boronic acids/esters

acylation-1.description: Acylation of an alkyne with an acid chloride.
acylation-1.long_name: Ynone synthesis from alkynes and acid chlorides

alkylation-1.description: Alkylation of a primary or secondary amine using a primary or secondary alkyl halide.
alkylation-1.long_name: Alkylation of amines using alkyl halides

alkylation-2.description: N-Alkylation of heterocycles using a primary or secondary alkyl halide.
alkylation-2.long_name: N-Alkylation of heterocycles using alkyl halides

amide_coupling-1.description: Traditional amide coupling using a carboxylic acid and a primary or secondary amine.
amide_coupling-1.long_name: Amide synthesis from carboxylic acids and primary or secondary amines

amide_coupling-2.description: Schotten-Baumann: Amide coupling using an acid chloride and a primary or secondary amine.
amide_coupling-2.long_name: Schotten-Baumann amide synthesis from acid chlorides and primary or secondary amines

amide_coupling-3.long_name: Intramolecular amide coupling to form lactams

amide_coupling-4.long_name: Intramolecular amide coupling to form quinolinones

amination-1.description: Buchwald-Hartwig Amination: N-arylation of primary and secondary amines using aryl halides.
amination-1.long_name: Buchwald-Hartwig amination from aryl halides and primary or secondary amines

amination-2.description: Reductive Amination: Alkylation of primary or secondary amines with a ketone or an aldehyde.

barton-zard-1.description: Synthesis of a substituted pyrrole from an isocyanoacetate and a nitroalkene

barton-zard-2.description: Synthesis of a substituted pyrrole from an isocyanoacetate and a nitrobenzene

benzimidazole-1.description: Benzimidazole synthesis from an ortho-amino aniline and a carboxylic acid or ester.
benzimidazole-1.long_name: 2-Substituted benzimidazole formation from carboxylic acids or esters

benzimidazole-2.description: Benzimidazole synthesis from an ortho-amino aniline and an aldehyde.

benzofuran-1.description: Benzofuran synthesis from a 2-iodo phenol and an alkyne.

benzothiazole-1.description: Benzothiazole synthesis from a 2-thiol aniline and an aldehyde.

benzoxazole-1.description: Benzoxazole synthesis from a 2-amino phenol and a carboxylic acid.
benzoxazole-1.long_name: 2-Substituted benzoxazole synthesis from 2NH-phenols and carboxylic acids or esters

benzoxazole-2.description: Benzoxazole synthesis from a 2-amino phenol and an aryl aldehyde.
benzoxazole-2.long_name: 2-Aryl benzoxazole synthesis from 2-aminophenols and aryl aldehydes

carbamate.description: Carbamate synthesis from isocyanates and primary or secondary alcohols.
carbamate.long_name: Carbamate synthesis from isocyanates and primary or secondary alcohols

carbamate-2.description: Carbamate synthesis from primary or secondary amines and primary or secondary alcohols.
carbamate-2.long_name: Carbamate synthesis from primary or secondary amines and primary or secondary alcohol

castro-stephens-2.description: Castro-Stephens coupling: synthesis of disubstituted acetylenes.
castro-stephens-2.long_name: Castro-Stephens coupling: synthesis of disubstituted acetylenes

chan-lam-1.description: Chan-Lam coupling: N-arylation of anilines with boronic acids.
chan-lam-1.long_name: Chan-Lam coupling: N-arylation of anilines with boronic acids

chan-lam-2.description: Chan-Lam coupling: O-arylation of phenols with boronic acids.

chan-lam-3.description: Chan-Lam coupling: S-arylation of thiophenols with boronic acids.
chan-lam-3.long_name: Chan-Lam coupling: S-arylation of thiophenols with boronic acids

claisen-1.description: Crossed Claisen condensation: 1,3-diketone synthesis from an enolizable ketone and a non-enolizable ester.

claisen-2.description: Claisen condensation: beta-keto ester synthesis from an enolizable ester and a non-enolizable ester.

corey-chaykovsky-1.description: Corey-Chaykovsky synthesis of an epoxide from an aldehyde or a ketone.

coumarin.description: Pechmann condensation: Coumarin synthesis from a phenol and a beta-keto ester.

curtius-1.description: Curtius rearrangement: ureas via isocyanates formed from carboxylates
curtius-1.long_name: Curtius rearrangement of carboxylates to isocynates and addition of amines to form carbamates and carbonates

curtius-2.description: Curtius rearrangement: carbamates via isocyanates formed from carboxylates
curtius-2.long_name: Curtius rearrangement of carboxylates to isocynates and addition of alcohols to form carbamates

curtius-3.description: Curtius rearrangement: formation of primary amines via hydrolysis of isocyanates formed from carboxylates
curtius-3.long_name: Hydrolysis of isocyanates formed by Curtius rearrangement starting from carboxylates

decarboxylative_coupling-1.description: Aryl C-C bond formation from an aryl carboxylic acid and an aryl halide.

diyne.description: Heterocoupling of two alkynes to form a 1,3-diyne (implicit formation of a haloalkyne).
diyne.long_name: Heterocoupling of two alkynes to form a 1,3-diyne (implicit formation of a haloalkyne)

erlenmeyer-plochl.description: Erlenmeyer-Plochl azlactone synthesis from aldehydes or ketones and N-acyl glycine.

ester-hydrolysis-1.description: Hydrolysis of an ester to the parent carboxylic acid.
ester-hydrolysis-1.long_name: Hydrolysis of an ester to the parent carboxylic acid.

ester-hydrolysis-2.description: Hydrolysis of an ester to the parent alcohol.
ester-hydrolysis-2.long_name: Hydrolysis of an ester to the parent alcohol.

esterification-1.description: Esterification of an alcohol using an acid chloride.
esterification-1.long_name: Esterification reaction from alcohols and acid chlorides

esterification-2.description: Esterification of an alcohol and a carboxylic acid.
esterification-2.long_name: Esterification reaction from alcohols and a carboxylic acid

ether-1.description: Ullmann aryl ether synthesis: gives a biaryl ether from an aryl halide and a phenol.

ether-2.description: Williamson ether synthesis: gives an ether from a primary or secondary halide and a primary, secondary or (hetero)aryl alcohol.

flavone.description: Flavone synthesis: gives a 2-aryl flavone from a 2-acyl phenol and an aryl acid chloride.
flavone.long_name: Flavone synthesis from 2-acyl phenols and aryl acid chlorides.

furan-1.description: Feist-Benary furan synthesis from a beta-keto-ester and a 2-halo ketone.
furan-1.long_name: Feist-Benary furan synthesis from 1,3-diketones and 2-halo ketones.

goldberg-1.description: Goldberg reaction: Ullman condensation of an aryl halide with an aniline or acetanilide.
goldberg-1.long_name: Goldberg reaction of an aryl halide with an aniline or acetanilide.

goldberg-2.description: Goldberg reaction: Ullman condensation of an aryl halide with a benzylpyrazolone.
goldberg-2.long_name: Goldberg reaction of an aryl halide with a benzylpyrazolone.

heck.description: Heck reaction: coupling of an activated alkene and aryl or vinyl halides.

imidazole-1.description: Imidazole synthesis from an alpha-chloro aldehyde and an amidine.

imidazole-2.description: Imidazole synthesis from an aryl aldehyde, 2-halo ketone and a primary amine.

indole-1.description: Bischler-Mohlau indole synthesis: gives a 2-aryl Indole from an aniline and a 2-halo aryl ketone.

indole-2.description: Fischer indole: gives an indole from an aryl hydrazine and a ketone.

isoxazole-1.description: Claisen isoxazole synthesis from a beta-ketoester and hydroxylamine.

mitsunobu-1.description: Mitsunobu: gives an aryl ether from an alcohol and a phenol.

mitsunobu-2.description: Mitsunobu: alkylation of a sulfonamide with a primary or secondary alcohol.

mitsunobu-3.description: Mitsunobu: N-alkylation of a tetrazole with a primary or secondary alcohol.

mitsunobu-4.description: Mitsunobu: N-alkylation of a tetrazole with a primary or secondary alcohol.

mitsunobu-5.description: Mitsunobu: esterification from an alcohol and a carboxylic acid.

negishi.description: Negishi: aryl C-C coupling from two halides (one will be prepared as an organozinc).

oxadiazole-1.description: Oxadiazole synthesis from a nitrile (converted to an amidoxime) and a carboxylic acid.

oxazole-1.description: Fischer Oxazole Synthesis: Generates an oxazole from an aldehyde and a cyanohydrin.

oxazole-2.description: 2,4-Disubstituted oxazole synthesis from monosubstituted alkynes and acetonitrile or proprionitrile (PhIO as oxygen source).

phthalazinone.description: Phthalazinone synthesis from 2-acylbenzoic acid and a hydrazine.

pyridine-1.description: Hantzsch pyridine synthesis from two beta-ketoesters, an aldehyde, and ammonia (stepwise).
pyridine-1.long_name: Hantzsch pyridine synthesis from two beta-ketoesters, an aldehyde, and ammonia (stepwise).

pyridine-2.description: Krohnke pyridine synthesis from a 2-halo ketone and an alfa,beta-unsaturated ketone.
pyridine-2.long_name: Krohnke pyridine synthesis from 2-halo ketone and an alfa,beta-unsaturated ketone

pyridine-3.description: Guareshi-Thorpe pyridine synthesis from a beta-ketoester, and a cyanoacetic ester.

pyrimidine-1.long_name: Pinner pyrimidine synthesis from a 1,3-diketones and an amidine

pyrimidinedione-1.description: Pyrimidinedione synthesis from amino-acrylates and isocyanates.
pyrimidinedione-1.long_name: Pyrimidinedione synthesis from amino-acrylates and isocyanates

pyrimidinedione-2.description: Bicyclic pyrimidinedione synthesis from 2-aminobenzoates and isocyanates.
pyrimidinedione-2.long_name: Bicyclic pyrimidinedione synthesis from 2-aminobenzoates and isocyanates

pyrimidone-1.long_name: Biginelli synthesis of 2-pyrimidones from a beta-ketoester, an aldehyde and urea

pyrimidone-2.long_name: Biginelli synthesis of 2-mercaptopyrimidines from a beta-ketoester, an aldehyde and thiourea

pyrrole-1.long_name: Knorr pyrrole synthesis from two beta-ketoesters

quinazoline-1.long_name: Quinazoline synthesis from a quinazolinone and a primary or secondary amine

quinazolinone-1.description: Quinazolinone synthesis from a 2-carboxy aniline, a primary amine, and an aldehyde.
quinazolinone-1.long_name: Quinazolinone Synthesis from a 2-carboxy aniline, a primary amine, and an aldehyde

quinazolinone-2.description: Niementowski quinazolinone synthesis from a 2-carboxy aniline, and a primary amide.

quinoline-1.description: Quinoline synthesis from a 2-amino benzaldehyde and a ketone.

quinoline-2.description: Niementowski quinoline synthesis from a 2-carboxy aniline and a ketone.

rubottom.description: Rubottom oxidation: alfa hydroxylation of an enolizable ketone via the corresponding silyl enol ether.

sonogashira.description: Sonogashira Coupling: Arylation of an alkyne with an aryl/vinyl halide.

spiro-chromanone.description: Spiro-chromanone synthesis from an o-hydroxyacetophenone and a cyclohexanone.

stille.description: Stille Coupling: aryl C-C coupling from an aryl or vinyl halide and an organostannane.

stille-2.description: Stille Carbonylative Coupling: aryl C-C coupling with CO insertion from an aryl or vinyl halide and an organostannane.

sulfonamide-1.description: Sulfonamide synthesis from a sulfonyl chloride and a primary or secondary amine.

sulfone-1.description: Oxidation of a thioether to a sulfone.
sulfone-1.long_name: Oxidation of a thioether to a sulfone

sulfone-2.description: Oxidation of a sulfoxide to a sulfone.
sulfone-2.long_name: Oxidation of a sulfoxide to a sulfone

sulfoxide.description: Oxidation of a thioether to a sulfoxide.
sulfoxide.long_name: Oxidation of a thioether to a sulfoxide

suzuki.description: Suzuki coupling: aryl C-C coupling from an aryl halide and an aryl/vinyl boronate.
suzuki.long_name: Suzuki coupling of aryl/vinyl boronates with aryl/vinyl halides

suzuki-2.description: Suzuki coupling: C-C coupling of an aryl halide and a trifluoroborate.
suzuki-2.long_name: Suzuki coupling of trifluoroborates and with aryl/vinyl halides

tetrahydroindole-1.description: Tetrahydroindole synthesis from a cyclohexanone, 2-OH ketone and a primary amine.

tetrazole-1.description: Tetrazole from nitrile and alkyl halide; first regioisomer.

tetrazole-2.description: Tetrazole from nitrile and alkyl halide; second regioisomer.

tetrazole-3.long_name: Synthesis of a terminal tetrazole from a nitrile and sodium azide

thiazole-1.description: Hantzsch thiazole synthesis from a thioamide and alpha-halo ketone.

thiazole-2.description: Hantzsch thiazole synthesis from thioformamide and an alpha-halo ketone.

thioether-1.description: Thioether synthesis from styrenes and thiols.

thioether-2.description: Thioether synthesis from halides and thiols.
thioether-2.long_name: Thioether synthesis with aryl or alkyl halides

thiourea-1.description: Thiourea synthesis from thioisocyanates and primary or secondary amines.

urea-1.description: Urea synthesis from isocyanates and primary or secondary amines.
urea-1.long_name: Urea synthesis from isocyanates and primary or secondary amines

urea-2.description: Urea synthesis from primary or secondary amines and primary or secondary amines.
